Title: USER
Description: Returns the current MariaDB user name and host name, given when authenticating to MariaDB,  as a string in the utf8 character set.

Note that the value of USER() may differ from the value of CURRENT_USER(), which is the user used to authenticate the current client. 
CURRENT_ROLE() returns the current active role.
SYSTEM_USER() and SESSION_USER are synonyms for USER().
Statements using the USER() function or one of its synonyms are not safe for statement level replication.
